tool_description: Estimates the time period and number of generations to the most recent common ancestor based on genetic sharing patterns.

relationship_type.description: Predicted relationship type from relationship predictor

population_background.description: Population background for generation time estimates

birth_years.description: Birth years of both individuals [year1, year2]

error_messages: Invalid shared DNA: shared_cm must be positive and within realistic range.
Unknown relationship type: Provide a valid relationship type from relationship predictor.
Invalid population background: Use a recognized population identifier.
Invalid birth years: Provide realistic birth years as [year1, year2] if specified.
Inconsistent data: Genetic data doesn't match the specified relationship type.
usage: Provide shared_cm and relationship_type as minimum requirements. Add population_background, known_genealogy_depth, and birth_years for more precise estimates.

generations_to_mrca.description: Estimated generations to most recent common ancestor

estimated_time_range.description: Estimated time period when common ancestor lived

confidence_interval.description: Confidence interval for the generation estimate

estimation_method.description: Method used for the ancestor estimation
